CFG
Class Edge

java.lang.Object
  CFG.Edge

public class Edge
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents an edge in the CFG, flows from U to V.

Constructor Summary
Edge(BasicBlock a, BasicBlock b)
          Creates an edge that is single flow
Edge(BasicBlock a, BasicBlock b, java.lang.String label)
          Creates an unidirectional edge with a label attached
 
Method Summary
 java.lang.String getLabel()
           
 BasicBlock getU()
           
 BasicBlock getV()
           
 java.lang.String toDot()
           
 java.lang.String toString()
          Returns a string representation: Edge: [U's basic block number] --> [V's basic block number] [label] Label is displayed when it is not null
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

Edge

public Edge(BasicBlock a,
            BasicBlock b)
Creates an edge that is single flow

Parameters:
a - Source basic block
b - Destination basic block

Edge

public Edge(BasicBlock a,
            BasicBlock b,
            java.lang.String label)
Creates an unidirectional edge with a label attached

Parameters:
a - Source basic block
b - Destination basic block
label - Label for that edge (i.e. True, False, Entry, Exit)

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
